text: The Indre Sunnan Bridge () is a cantilever bridge in the municipality of Bodø in Nordland county, Norway. It crosses a strait between the island of Straumøya and the village of Tuv on the mainland. The Saltstraumen strait and its famous maelstrom lie just a short distance to the northeast. The bridge is long and the main span is . title: Indre Sunnan Bridge
